Title: Minefield
Plot: The first years are given trust exercises to help build a connection with their pas de deux partners. Tara is frustrated when Christian refuses to participate, Kat feels betrayed by Tara's secret crush on her brother, and Sammy finds himself tied to Abigail for 24 hours.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
